synopsis.p: Categorizes documents with a model trained with OpenNLPDocumentCategorizerTrain.

description.p: uses a model trained with OpenNLPDocumentCategorizerTrain to categorize unlabeled documents. The documents are specified by documents. The classifier algorithm uses the document content specified by tokens and form.

param-doc.name: categoryFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the predicted category.

param-doc.name: scoreFeature
param-doc.p: Feature where to store the score of the predicted category.

param-doc.name: scoresFeaturePrefix
param-doc.p: Prefix of feature names where to store the score of each category.
